message:
Getting below error while installing HCM PUM image 26 on windows 10. 

PS H:\PSPUM\dpk\puppet\production\manifests> puppet apply site.pp
Error: Evaluation Error: Error while evaluating a Function Call, Could not find class ::pt_role::pt_hcm_pum for desktop-
qlvgdbc.home at H:/PSPUM/dpk/puppet/production/manifests/site.pp:22:3 on node desktop-qlvgdbc.home

Please help on this.
